lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Gripping her holy symbol in one hand, and her morningstar in the other, this time, Pike is ready.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also ale!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As she hiked down the mountain towards Stillben, she meditated on the task ahead. Part of the Aramente is proving yourself a strong warrior, a valiant protector, and a wise and compassionate leader. With this knowledge, one thought plays on repeat in her mind: Is she even worthy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then one night, Percy had a dream. A roaring cloud of smoke offered him vengeance against those who destroyed his family. When he awoke, Percy began to design his first gun. (gunshot)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Count on Scanlan for a hearty laugh, a rollicking song, and a twinkle in his eye that melts hearts and makes the females swoon.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Some may describe me as buffoonish, but I say poppycock to all that. I am much sharper than most give me credit for. I just don't pay attention to things sometimes. I've also been known to be rather cunning, loyal, happy-go-lucky, and well, dangerous. I can't help but show my true scales every now and then. But overall, I think I'm quite friendly for a dragonborn!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An outsider since birth, Vax quickly learned to solve life's challenges in his own particular way, often by side-stepping them entirely. And when his knack for circumventing adversity isn't enough, (knife scraping) the way of blades the elves schooled him in more than makes up the difference.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also, he is adorable, and gives expert massages.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey guys, welcome back. While we are missing Travis, it's totally fine, Avengers is a fantastic film. It's a wonderful film and hope he doesn't spoil anything for us in his return, but he is missed. Travis, we miss you. We'll have you back next week, hopefully.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to spoil the movie for everybody: they win!

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: But do they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know. It's Joss Whedon (laughs)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I didn't say who 'they' were.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's true. All right, so, welcome everyone. For those of you who's this the first time, (laughs) buckle up for some interesting-- So we're a bunch of voice actors who play Dungeons & Dragons and this is our campaign we've been running for a while. To give you a little heads-up on the story so far, the party was hired to find an individual named Lady Kima, and she is a halfling paladin. The platinum dragon Bahamut is her deity

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we found her!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, picking up there where we left off. You're all breathing heavily. The sincerity of the battle has just come over you. The adrenaline's still pumping through your system.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your foot is melted off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's kind of there (groans).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mostly. There's some... You can see four of the five toes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's not bad. It's four out of five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About three and a half.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did I lose the big or the small?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) This would be the small.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, you can do without the pinkie.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your balance is probably a little wonky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Clears that athlete's foot, though. Gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure enough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is anyone following us? Can we do a quick check around and just see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Perception check? Starting it off with a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing around, you start hearing various duergar screams from above as the individuals that were still inside the fortress are in the process of trying to get out, or in the process of slowly melting in the molten rock. What you do also notice is that off towards the bottom base of the stronghold, a number of duergar that reside in the buildings that surround the exterior of Emberhold proper are mounting arms and charging up towards the stronghold to give aid to wherever this seeming, loud shouting and screaming is coming from

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can they see us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does anyone seem to be paying attention to us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they're far enough away where you don't think it's an issue, and you're off to the side, for the moment. But you do see probably close to 30 to 40 duergar are currently swarming out the small city, making their way towards Emberhold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So right now they're focused on the chaos of the temple?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should get out of here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There was a path further down that led further on into the tunnels. I think we should follow that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, hang on. Grog can't be far, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He could be in another dimension.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, he can only be a thousand feet away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Says who?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They used the spell Dimension Door that Tiberius has.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we hope he used Dimension Door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a spell that can go to another dimension (chuckles).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I remember the gods on high telling us last week that we recognized the spell that was used.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Tiberius.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw man, I feel that comes back to bite us in the ass later (nervous laugh) because he is still conscious, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He has no idea what's happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's in darkness. He can't hear. He's not conscious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If Grog is close, we still need to get out of the way of these 30 people. So let's go hide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We still need to hide. And heal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's at least follow the path, find a place where we can hide, and recuperate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Around the corner or something. Can we stealth further down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try to. You currently are carrying two large solid stone statues with you, so it's definitely possible, but you're going to have to come up with a creative way of doing so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog had the rug, didn't he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog had the entire bag of holding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and cast Pass Without a Trace on the party.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy, I think you and I are on Tiberius duty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. (sighs) Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we do not move, will this 30 duergar mass hit us at some point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can find out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Jesus (laughs)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's like asking the future.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because it's connected to my rope. Can I use that and tie it around Kima and hook it to Trinket so he can drag Kima along?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very clever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I will say for this circumstance as you guys are preparing this: casting the spell, beginning dragging the stone. The group make an initiative check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We took too much time!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should just run.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you have some flashing, there we go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's been a kind die to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, 20 plus whatever your initiative modifier is.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Who cares.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Distract them. Get them away from us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you guys are still within eyesight, technically, of any duergar on that side of the fortress, so I'm going to ask everyone now to make a stealth check. Those that are pulling the statues with disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that's Trinket.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Plus ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we all add plus ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. To the final roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a question. If I have advantage for other reasons-- I have a cloak of elvenkind which gives me advantage-- does the advantage and disadvantage cancel out into one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They do. Your foot being wounded, though, is a disadvantage right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that then goes back down to disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't win with this guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're dragging a statue with a partially melted foot right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Liam, it doesn't matter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You still have plus ten to the roll because Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus the ten?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's including the ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 20. That's my low roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 20 for Trinket and 29 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 20, 25 minutes or so, you manage to pull just past where the lava flow dips down into what looks like a small opening in the flooring, and you are past the immediate heat of the magma river. You are now pressed up against the wall of the cavern as it begins to twist around and head downward, further deeper into this subterranean mountainous space. You're all beaten, you're all sore, and currently, what do you want to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keyleth, can you cover the entrance to where we are to give us a little bit more of a stealthy--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No more spells?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am exhausted. I can't do anything else right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And what's the terrain? Is it just flat out out in the open to see, or is it scoured with ins and outs? Peaks and valleys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the same type of topography you've encountered when you first entered this giant cavern. So you can see large, crooked black spires of obsidian rock shooting up and curving towards the ceiling. It's all over the place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can do that still.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, maybe you can make it--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I make it to where it just looks like a wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long does it last?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think Hallucinatory Terrain lasts an hour, if I think about it. Books, books, where's my book?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look around and and see if there's anywhere that looks like we could hide, tuck in between rocks or something where we wouldn't be visible?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a perception.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, I get an advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you are in the Underdark, correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It lasts for 24 hours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 24 hours!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Put a lava flow in front of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you have to be concentrating the whole time. And you can't. You can't go to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she's glancing at that, you make your way about ten minutes away from the area where the rest of the group is currently gathered, keeping a very very close eye on the topography of the wall of the cavern as it slowly curves around and further in that direction. You do manage to find portions of the wall that jut out and leave these small pockets. They themselves might not be super safe for a long period of time, but they give you a little bit of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Little bit of cover, depending on how well you were to dress. You might be able to see few individuals discovering you if you were to stay there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Let's do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I'm going to go ahead and cast it and make it look like there's just a wall with another lava flow that's come out, and is starting to happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you walk back to notify the party, you watch as a portion of the mountain seemingly out of nowhere, extends, and a lava flow appears, pouring out of the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, was someone not inside?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we're all in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She was out and about while you did this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was searching for another place to hide.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's fine. It's an illusion. Vax pokes his head through the illusionary lava and goes, We're in here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Lovely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have a decent pocket of space here that as long as nothing attempts to walk into the wall, you should be okay to rest here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we have some time. Let's regroup.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should probably--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sleep in shifts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, here's what I'm afraid of. If we sleep we could lose Grog's trail. He could be nearby right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not much use to anyone right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just make a decision right now to leave Grog and continue on.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just forget about him. He was a good friend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll have a toast to him.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll sing about songs of his memory.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You are shitting with us, right?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Within a few days we'll forget he ever existed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scanlan, no one else wants to go to a whorehouse with you. You'll be going to whorehouses alone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here's another option. My foot hurts, but I'm not too bad. How are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sighs) I'm okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could go look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or maybe I can use my tracking and see if I can catch a scent. Grog does smell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can use my beast sense; that is one more thing I can still do. I could theoretically-- We could use Trinket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to undo the stone that has taken over Tiberius and Kima.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I have the necessary tools to synthesize a potion out of the basilisk blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try. It's a very ramshackle set-up. You do not have an alchemical set, but you can certainly attempt to, using a small fire, a couple of your general smelting tools you use for your metal work. You could attempt to distill it down, but that would be a combination of a tinkering roll on your point, followed up by somebody else's medicine roll to attempt to properly prepare it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are all of Tiberius's things stone with him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to walk over to Tiberius and cast Greater Restoration on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius, you briefly go from this moment in the heat of combat where you feel your muscles intensify and tensing up and not answering to your mind's command as you look up angrily at a series of duergar that have just been blown up by a fireball, to cold taking yourself. And as the cold fades, you are now in the center of a gargantuan cavern surrounded by all of your friends. You guys watch as Tiberius's form fades in through the stone.

lines.name: MARISHA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Tiberius!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job Pike!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was so worried about you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or we could cast a spell. That also works well.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (Dwarven accent) What the hell is going on?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't know if that was going to work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But that the only time you can do that, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, she can't do that again? You can't do it again for Kima.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have another 5th level now, so I could do it again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And once we rest, you'll have it again?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (Dwarven accent) Whoa. What happened to all the other little dwarves?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't have to do the accent anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You probably should keep your voice down, Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, this is just how I sound.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You don't have to act like a god anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog is missing, actually.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (Dwarven accent) Oh, great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the queen took him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you stuck like this?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we going to rest?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, but what about Kima?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to find Grog!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we do find him, we can't do anything!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you unstone Kima now or?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can, but then I wouldn't have another 5th level.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (Dwarven accent) Clarota, what do you think we should do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota, who is currently like staring at the statue of Kima, you can see there's a brief bead of thought behind Clarota's eyes and the voice sinks into the rest of your minds simultaneously. "We may be able to leave her here for safekeeping."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I knew you were going to say that. A different option. Oh, and thank you, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you insist on bringing her, then we should do it soon. We should not be leaving "anything behind. Trace of our passage."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where did your kin take our big friend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota thinks for a second and says, "It was not my kin that took him but the duergar. If "anything, I imagine he might be residing within that infernal city, though if they've taken him "elsewhere I do not know the way of the ash-skins."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: But Kima does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should wake her up.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Pike, you can do it one more time and take a little rest, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am going to walk on over to Kima. Touch her. Cast Greater Restoration again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where do you touch her? (laughs)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I touch her arm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't cheapen this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Classy. As you reach out, the divine energy emanates from Pike's hand that begins to cascade across Kima's form. Kima, who is in mid battle, with her greatsword in the air, as soon as her flesh returns to her, she finishes her swing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I put my shield up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, it does (ping) into the side of your shield and you deflect the blow and you see Kima for a second is like, (panting slowing to normal breathing).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Easy! Easy!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Calm down!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She throws the blade down on the ground and goes, "I am so sorry."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We are fine it was just a shield. We're fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She reaches around and she pulls her symbol of Bahamut out from her around her neck and just clutches it for a second and says, "What happened?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You were turned to stone, the king got killed, the queen took Grog, we don't know where.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Clarota was really helpful to us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually, Clarota got you out of that castle alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She turns around and glares at Clarota briefly with a look of confusion and mistrust and Clarota just goes-- (all laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You honestly would not be here if it weren't for the illithid. It's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She glances back at you and gives under her breath, "And there's a good chance none of us may "be here if it gets its way down the road. (louder) Nevertheless, I thank you. It is good to know at "least we took one of their top champions down. The fact that the queen still exists is worrisome, as "at least from what I seemed to gather she had the true reign over most of the duergar down here."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Do you know where she would be at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where did she escape? How did she take him?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She disappeared with our goliath friend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh my gosh. Wait, did I Hunter's Mark the queen?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, you did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can use my Hunter's Mark to track her!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long does it last and how does it work?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But that was just 30 minutes ago.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, but we all have to rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It maintains for up to eight hours!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight hours, but we have to rest!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because we need to heal. I am pretty low.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm at two.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're at two?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Theory? Proposition? Proposal. What if we use your Hunter's Mark, figure out where she is, get there, camp out nearby, tackle it in the morning?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use my Hunter's Mark to find out where she is and then we rest and go there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can attempt that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if we took a short rest?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait. Let's just find out where she is first.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because that's all really anyone sleeps anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think six hours is about what it takes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six to eight hours is the general long rest period that I would allow for that.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we should all rest for a moment. I think Vex'ahlia and I should go out for an hour or two, just to see which direction-- I mean, they are not going to back to Emon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got Hunter's Mark! Just stay put, Footless! (all laugh)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wait a minute. What happened to your toe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're not stealth anymore. You got a busted foot. You're at disadvantage on everything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was pretty awesome 30 minutes ago. Now I'm just slightly less awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we at least heal you up, before you go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Just give us one second. Can I use the freaking Hunter's Mark?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How does it work?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take a moment, you step beyond the boundary of the illusion momentarily, close your eyes and concentrate on that small blip of nature based divine energy that you lent and grappled onto Queen Ulara with. You take a moment and concentrate and you recall her face, you recall, strangely, her scent. In a weird way, the bestial nature of your connection with Trinket and nature, scent is a very strong means of tracking and the scent of a duergar is a very terrible mix between salty brine and earth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like Axe for Men?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You concentrate on this and you recall the stronghold, you begin to see a trace where all of a sudden her path in the stronghold is fading and is cold. A new path has opened up in the center of the duergar city at the base of the stronghold. It seems to have moved slightly in that direction, but you can't pinpoint where, and is currently at rest somewhere in that vicinity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She is still close.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (louder) So that is right in front of the keep?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. Are they in an underground base?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They are in the city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially, where the cavern kind of rises up and meets the wall, Emberhold is at the top of that rising of the ground, and Emberhold lies there, where all the lava pours down and trickles down. You guys are off to the side. This whole portion of the floor that crawls up to Emberhold is covered in duergar buildings. It is a small city that surrounds it. She resides somewhere in the center of that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're on the same level as them or are they above us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are a little bit above. You guys are at a lower point, as the actual ground you follow curves around and descends.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But once we walk out of here we will be at the same level.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a theory. I've a new skill that I've recently learned and was practicing a lot when I was with the Earth Ashari while we were gone for the past six months. They taught me the ways of the earth elementals.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, that's fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So. And as an earth-- but I am still new at it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's okay, we all start somewhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. I mean I am a little self-conscious about it still, but I can travel through the earth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And pop up, perhaps, where she is?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (Dwarven accent) Ooh, like a little gopher.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of us? Or just you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is not a burrowing thing, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glide through the earth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: More like a Shadowcat kind of thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it all of us or just you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just me. But I could get inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, but then you will be alone, surrounded by duergar and Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I am not talking about right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Could we put invisibility on her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we do some sort of flanking thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well that does sound useful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is. It is going to be useful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am wondering if we can make a tunnel, though. I can theoretically-- okay, theoretically we could rest and I could keep all of my spells and use all of my magical focus to tunnel us out, depending on how far we are going. We can do an underground approach

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But concretely, right now we need nappies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's sleep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But what if they leave while we sleep?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we are essentially powerless.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And what are we going to do if we find them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to only sleep for a little bit, cause I didn't use all my spells I only need to rest for half the amount of time, maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A solid six hours you'd probably be able to, since you guys are in a hidden area you'll feel more comfortable, depending on how you set your bedding here you could probably do it in six hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we'll be fine. Because she needs to rest as well. We hurt her pretty badly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it is safe to assume she's brought Grog back to her seat of power. Why would she go anywhere else? She's at her strongest where she is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think they're staying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sleep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got to sleep, Keyleth.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know. You're right. I see what you're saying, but we need to...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog will be fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's at a two!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so mad at him. Why'd he get stolen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. Let us rest."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Brilliant idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One last thing before we lay our heads down for the night. Pike, do you have any salve or anything you could help me put on my foot, or could your god help with my little toe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could help you with some natural mediciney stuff, maybe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It stings a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have not encountered a person with any sort of physical marring to this degree, necessarily, and those that usually did, it was a permanent thing. So this is something that you would have to experiment with.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Could I try healing? A very concentrated energy just on his foot? A healing spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could certainly try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do it, Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there anyway I could assist her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly. All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's try it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Possibly?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean a clockwork foot from Percy does sound cool.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If we're going to rest, it doesn't hurt to try.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That way we can sleep on it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You can sleep on it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Literally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe this yellow vial of potion could do something for it as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's Ben-gay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll try Cure Wounds at, I'll try 4th level, since we're going to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right so go ahead and roll the corresponding dice for that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I roll...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 4d8 + 5 Is what it would be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I keep an ear out for anything approaching?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very much so.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, plus my spell caster--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus your modifier, which is five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I start building a positive chi. Like a healing chi ball.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is she doing a standard healing here? Is my song of rest going to help at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your song of rest would actually be of aid to this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. So I'm going to sing while you heal, if that's all right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Please do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the healers convene, Scanlan begins--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I light some sage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, ready? (singing) Wherever you go, whatever damage they've done, we will be right here waiting to heal you. No matter what hit points you take or how your foot breaks, we will be right here--

lines.name: SAM, ASHLEY
lines.text: Waiting for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you take the healing energy you've gathered from your own nature-based casting, you infuse the healing spell. You do how many points of healing from the spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27. Go ahead and make a medicine check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this what I can maybe assist her with?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looks really disgusting by the way. It's so gross.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do I roll? Do I roll the 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20, and add your proficiency modifier

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I apply my Luck feat to her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Feet pun!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. As you finish the spell, you can see where the mostly-gone second small toe has grown to mostly a full toe, and there's a small stub where the little one is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got a toe nubbin.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey man, we got a little stub. A little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're promoting a level of divine regeneration at a very, very slow pace. You've never attempted this before, and there is some progress, but this may be an over time thing you have to do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Over time, I just keep doing it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once a day, you might want to attempt this and eventually he probably will recover. But not immediately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Until then, he's a gimp.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I see Pike's deity in my toenail! (all laugh)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's gonna take time. That was just a little manicure that we did real quick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could just own it and call you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Little piggy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well I was going to say Vax the Nine-Toe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And put a knife on it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could put a very tiny knife on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A teeny tiny little knife.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could clip your own nails.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can get you a prosthetic little toe that has a little compartment for poison.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would take a brass claw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or a brass claw toe. That's fun. Maybe we could get you a raptor claw. That's cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we go to sleep, I go over to Kima and I say to her, Lady Kima, I think we're all going to take a rest and you as well, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think I should."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can trust you while we're all asleep not to do anything to any of our companions, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Remember: he has to make the side-step, the wrong step, before I take any action. Trust and know "that if I were to strike a blow, it's at his own poor choice and actions."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That first part of what you said rhymed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does she seem to be telling the truth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A what? What check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Insight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Insight. Okay, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She seems to be true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But also understands that at this moment, it has not done anything to necessarily draw her blade.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lady Kima, Clarota, may I suggest you take the first watch?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) Oh my god, what if they start fucking? (all laugh)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So it's going to be that sort of evening, excellent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rated M, for mature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota says, "Should you insist." And Clarota's image shimmers and vanishes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm falling asleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are all going to sleep, Kima's still sharpening her sword and she stops for a second and goes, "Everyone, I'm sorry you've lost your friend. If he lives, we shall find him."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He will live.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we will find him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, he will, Scanlan! You just calm down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But if they have indeed taken him prisoner and Emberhold is lost, there is only one place "they would bring him: Yug'Voril."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) With the dude with the black horn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Considering the mess that you've made since entering their realm of living and work, you'd "make for a great gift to their current standing demigod. If we aren't able to find him within the "city, I think that may be the next place to look."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Once again, are you afraid they're going to take him while we're asleep? Is this a genuine concern? Is this something we should move on now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not as long as you're keeping concentration, we should be fine."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're busted up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's legitimately nothing to be done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a softness that hits Kima's face and you can see a bit of a quiver to her chin and she goes, "The guilt I feel for unknowingly putting you all in danger for my sake is immense. It's "because of me and my actions that you even delved this far and nearly lost life and limb, merely at "the behest of Allura and... I want you all to know that I appreciate it. I really, truly do."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's great. If you can mention that to Allura, that'd be wonderful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would really appreciate it to speak to Tiberius."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (mumbles, makes spell sounds, returns to normal voice) I would really appreciate it if you mentioned that to Allura. I'm trying to get into her good graces and whatnot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura is a good friend. Well we've known each "other for... gods, 15 years now. Since we defeated the Scourged Rider, together. But she has always "had more of a political mind than I do, so, when we were both offered a seat on the council of "Tal'Dorei and Emon she stayed, and I... I'm a woman of action, and I "knew my destiny was out in the world."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We share something in common, Lady Kima. I, too, have left my home and land because I did not want to sit on the council of Draconia. With blessings from my father and such, I gained ambassadorship on a mission for them, but really, just so I could--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: To get all the things out, and I saw this wonderful lamb in this field one time--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was speak to Allura of your honor and deeds, Tiberius. We try to have drinks and swap "stories every few months. She's a good one."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, I think so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes a moment to herself and looks around at the rest of you and says, "The cruel "king. Who dealt the final blow?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (clears throat) That would be the kingslayer. Me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing) Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. The cruel king is down, and I thank you for that." She walks back to the little perch on the rock at the side of the wall and says, "He tried to break me. Relish in his false "superiority. Dragging hooks across my flesh, underestimating the will of a servant of "Bahamut."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you congratulating us for being murderers? Is that what you're doing right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Murder and justice are two entirely different things and the deities of all good saw "to it that this King's time was limited."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you suggesting now that we control the wills of the deities?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, but we enact them, as long as we work within your plans to keep us safe."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's mighty bold and presumptuous of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My life has been given to guidance of the platinum dragon, who has not seen nothing but the "positive direction for all of your species, mine and the rest of humanity, that exists in the "material plane. You would do well to not disrespect one who looks out for you, even though "you may not look up to him for guidance. The reason these lands that you grew up in are safe "and free, as much as they are, are because of the sacrifices of my brethren who came before me under "his light and guidance. I'm not saying you to worship him-- each one has their own gods of "choice. I just say, show some respect."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do show respect, Lady Kima. I show respect when I feel that respect has been earned.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: She's royalty, you have to understand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all a bit cranky. Maybe we should just turn in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I watched as they executed my companions! The wondrous men and women who came down to these "caverns at my sides with my coin in their pockets, with the promise of justice. And they laughed as "they cut their throats before me, hoping it would be able to crack me. It was Bahamut's strength "that held me there."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before we start boasting congratulations and you start thanking us, why don't you wait? And we'll see what happens when we all get out of here first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's suffering from PTSD. Why are you poking the badger?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should just calm down and go to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you look up at her face, there's a tension, but you can see now that she's stepped near in to you, towards what little bit of light seems to cascade through this cavern, there are tears streaking down her face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you feel now? (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They tried all they could to break me, but I knew my destiny would not end here. I have a "destiny that does not end here."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then retreat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lady Kima, as I'm sure you know, grief speaks before sense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All I'm saying, Lady Kima, is that after what we have done and what we have been through and the lives and the blood that even I have on my hands, you had better be worth it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let us wait for talk of worth and talk of might until we are reunited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She puts a hand up towards you. "Child, let me explain to you why we are here. As while you "may have stepped into the pretense of keeping me out of harm's way, there is a purpose that I and "now all of us serve, here in the Underdark. Now, I've been on this journey for more than a year, "traveling wherever the wind took me, finding where my gift would find an end to suffering, justice to "the wicked and comfort to the downtrodden. I'd just returned from the frozen tundra northeast of "these Cliffkeep mountains, heading to meet with Allura, the same friend who brought you here."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I pop out of my sleep. Did you say Allura again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shh."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiberius. Shh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your friend's loss is a terrible thing, but we will try to find him and should we not, understand "that his sacrifice was not in vain. For we're here not to save one, but thousands, hundreds of "thousands of lives, if we succeed. So we sleep, we rest, we find your friend and we destroy this, "this abomination, this anathema."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sleep tight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She picks up her blade, sits back down and goes back to sharpening (sounds of a sharpening stone hitting blade).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was weird, right? Good night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That went well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, I'll cuddle you for warmth, if that would help?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's already so hot in here with all the lava and stuff, I would just prefer to sleep alone. I'm sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fine. That's what I meant.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn into Minxie form and go off in the corner and curl up in the corner.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We better let it heal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, go sleep with Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Trink!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear sounds and sniffing)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who wants nibbles?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket comes up and curls next to you. The evening goes by, uneventful. Occasionally, you stumble out of your rest, keep an eye out. The beacon still resides. From what you can imagine, a natural body sleep cycle that you're used to passes. A few begin to wake up before the others, as you have no daylight to ascertain whether it is day or night. Indeed, who knows what it is at this point.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I relieved myself in the middle of the night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you for telling us, Tiberius.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you get up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just wake up in a puddle of his own dragonborn filth?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As we do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So have we healed completely?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you've all healed completely at this point. You had an evening's rest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we get all our spells back and stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get your spells back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to pick them for the day, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can do things again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, hang on, got to think about this.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Put some Greater Restorations in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your mark? Wait, your mark, your Hunter's Mark, which you can feel, the magic of it is slowly waning as the spell comes to the end of its effective period, is moving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Where's it moving?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's moving out of the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where, which direction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can tell, it's heading towards the opposite side of the cavern towards where it curves down, deeper and below.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. Where is that in relation to us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To where you guys are? If you're looking out from next to the Emberhold, it's to your right, curving down and around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should go that direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go and cast Pass Without a Trace on us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Beyond the Goblin city..."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To take back the child, which you have stolen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have no power over me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The way we came in the city was through the side path, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, the side of Emberhold, which you followed the curvature of this giant cavern around and you slept on the side, up against the wall, using the illusion, the illusory terrain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we're already--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're already away from Emberhold, you're on the side of the wall, maybe about a quarter to a half a mile further down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But if we keep going, we'll get to the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll head down further into the cavern, seemingly in the direction where her Hunter's Mark is currently leading, which has now faded.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! Your Hunter's Mark is gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it went that way. We should go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, let's go. Let's just hurry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As stealthily as possible so we don't alert the entire freaking camp.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got Pass Without a Trace, so we should be all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I try to make it look like we weren't around this area as much as possible without our Dust of Tracelessness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're sweeping behind the group as they're all moving along. With your imaginary brush.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Trinket's doing that thing where he pulls with his front feet and drags with his behind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's just rolling like a giant brillo brush.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I put Stone Shape in my Ring of Holding last night with my unused spells. I meant to tell you that last night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all right. All right, you do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I forgot you had that ring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I take out my Ioun Stones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so your Ioun Stones are now slowly rotating around your head. Well, you can only have one up at a time.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, I only have one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, okay, good. You said stones, so.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sorry. Pathfinder habit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the rest of you gather, you cast your spell Pass Without a Trace. You continue to crest along the outskirts of the cavern wall at this point. Looking over, you can see, throughout the night, most of the fortress, currently-- the lava fall that once contained it is completely cooled and is dark. It looks like their way of stopping the flow was to stop the entire magma fall. Who knows how much damage has been done, but currently the flow is halted and you can see now, there's a number of parties of duergar that are wandering out, through the cavern, presumably in search for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So technically, Lady Kima, we might be able to get back in eventually and get your weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you say that, she grins to herself and says, "I would like that very much. I had some "sentimental value to that equipment."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And there's a vault.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And there is a vault."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless it melted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This will greatly enhance your ability to move forward with us, won't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think right now time is of the essence for your friend more than anything."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should go look for Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Besides, I highly doubt that that stronghold has been left alone, just because it's "filled with rock."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe on the way out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you guys progress on the side, I would like everybody to roll a stealth check, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I don't know which one to roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're a normal roll right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (softly) Stealth check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We have advantage?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have plus ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you have disadvantage still.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do not. There's no plus anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus ten.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ten still?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I didn't roll for Trinket. Hold on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, Trinket rolled a one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, shush. Oh, I didn't feed him today, he's probably so hungry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have any of us eaten?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We've rested.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially, as opposed to having this minutiae of reminding you all to eat, I just consider when you rest and take short rests, you're snacking and resting. Otherwise, we communally spend ten minutes a game talking about what you ate. If food begins to become scarce, which it may in time, I'll let you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Foot flakes anyone? Foot flakes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fresh-ish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fresh-ish?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fresh-ish blood, if you will. You smell fresh-ish blood. You immediately glance over and you can see on the side of this cavern, which is about 50, 60 feet wide at this point, as it's come to a pinching point leading downward, you can see a spatter of blood across the wall to your immediate left, and what looks like a mangled mass of what once was a duergar, currently just torn asunder across this rock wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it look to be natural, done by an animal? Or does it look like people with weapons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The only time I've seen duergar split across like this was when we saw the camp of that creepy centipede creature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With the stalagmite coming up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see any of those kind of tracks around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some parts are scarred, some sort of acidic burn, and you see tooth marks, you see claw marks and you see portions of limbs that have been pulled off by sheer force.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could I do a nature check to see if I would know of a creature that could do this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You certainly can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to be that centipede creature thingy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26. It's weird. There are elements of the drag marks on the ground that resemble a creature that has pseudopods or some sort of a tentacle-like mass, but you know of no natural creature that also has this power, this type of hunting technique, nor would be this far underground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's another stitch monster.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stitch monster.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stitch monster.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a good name.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Something tentacle-y though. Nothing ever good is tentacle-y.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I tell if Grog definitely came this way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a tracking check, so just go ahead and roll a d20. You have advantage, because you're in the Underdark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do I add that to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll see if I find it before you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't understand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's on the sheet I gave you, with all your character stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Okay, cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one. The one that's easiest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural explorer, primeval awareness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just looking at words right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a survival check. There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a survival check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Oh, good. So that's 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. All right. Looking around, what you do find is, there is a very familiar scent that a goliath barbarian does have. You, using Trinket's help, as you yourself are not quite as attuned, Trinket does pick up a little bit of Grog's scent in this pathway. So Trinket (moans) gives you a nudge and points deeper down the cavern. And you can see what looks to be a smattering of small duergar-sized feet and two grooves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two grooves?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About two-inch-wide grooves that continue down the path.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if they have him prisoner now. If he came out of his mind funk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wheel tracks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It could very well be wheel tracks.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Or they're dragging his body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're consistent and their width is consistent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Their width is consistent? And they seem clean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They've put him on some sort of stretcher thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, sounds like they have him on, yeah, a trailer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lovely. Well, Grog definitely came this way. As did the stitch monster, so you don't have much choice but to follow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's continue.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Shall we?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be aware. We're all very aware of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Any movement at all... happening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guys, stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keeping your eyes peeled, you travel for another two and a half hours down this cavern path. It grows tighter at points where you can only really fit three or four individuals through, it's about 20, 25 feet wide, then opens up sporadically into other small pockets, where the natural topography of this portion of this Underdark cavern structure seems to weave and bend. The warmth and that sulfurous smell that was intrinsic to the duergar portion of this cavern that you were so used to, begins to slowly fade and temperature begins to drop. Still uncomfortable, but it's growing more humid as opposed to dry heat.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After another hour of travel, keeping your eyes out, the temperature drops significantly and is actually quite cold. The heat in the volcanic portion of this cavern structure apparently has passed you now, and you've hit an area of the rock where it is a much more chilled, much more ominous--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's humid still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Human?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Humid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The air becomes a dry cold.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So we're past that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You eventually using, which by the way the only light source you have going forward is the light from your staff.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, Light!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I assume you've had it up this whole time or you've been walking in the darkness.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, yes, of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) You continue down and the topography, which was once the black, jagged obsidian flooring of the previous portion of the Underdark, begins to give way to a more natural gray sand-type texture. Your feet sink about a quarter inch or so with each step, and you get about ten, 15 feet before the color of the sand and the texture changes dramatically. It looks almost like a peppering of small whitish-yellow stones and rocks, as well as bits of black and grey. It's like a giant, rocky pit out in front of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Meaning it's all solid stone that color or loose gravel and rock?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find sand and then the sand eventually gives way to like larger pieces of these rocks and stones.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it's like a pebble ball pit in front of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm looking for signs of mining.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to make an arcana check, also.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see some veins that are dried up. Looks like maybe the duergar had business down here mining.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it look like there-- Can I do a nature check to see if this is an old lake bed? Like there is a river bed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, go and do that. What did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you checking?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: For arcana.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you checking?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Just general, if I feel a general source of sinister magic anywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing arcane seems to emanate from the vicinity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vex'ahlia, you know the Underdark. Are there any critters crawling around in that pit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this still the Underdark?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You seem to be still in the Underdark, but the Underdark in general you're familiar with; your training and studying on the denizens of it, what things to look for. This is not a natural or overall occurrence you've read about before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't sense anything or any creatures nearby?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not per se.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolled a 16? As you're looking around, you go and inspect the stones. What you do notice is, they're not stones. There are pieces of glass, little shards of actual volcanic glass scattered across this entire field mixed with an endless seemingly sea of small bone chunks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Chunks?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pieces of bone that have been rounded off, ground, broken.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Bone petals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're ancient.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so there appears to be-- are there any whole pieces of bones? Big femurs or skulls?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This was some sort of burial ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to see. Most of the bones that have been here, have been around long enough to the point where they've eroded, been broken, destroyed over and over again to the point where you can't discern any of the original creatures they may have come from. It's just a sea of bone, obsidian glass, and small bits of stone that have fallen from the actual nearby cavern.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we see any sort of civilized construction here? Or is this all the work of nature or some living thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? You look past the barrier of his light spell, because you can only get a little bit past that due to your elven low-light vision. You do notice there are occasionally some spires of natural rock, some stalagmites that are jutting out in the distance, and you see what looks like some semblance of a ruined wall just beyond the edge of the vision. Like a crumbled, small wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use my primeval awareness and see if I can sense Grog within six miles of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Certainly. All right, so how does your primeval awareness work, miss ranger?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I can use an action to focus my awareness on a region around me and then I can sense whether-- oh, well, no. It's only certain types of creatures.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Which are?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like goliath?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, no. It says "aberrations, celestials, dragons, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead".

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That still might be useful, even if it doesn't find Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you do gather, you do sense a very strong force of aberration-based, much further, like five miles ahead, way ahead, and you have this weird, "Okay, good to know." You don't sense anything else, but you do sense a general presence about this entire sea of bone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've been here!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was here in the vision.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, it was a field of broken glass and bone, and I feel like this is it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So what do we do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then after that, I got to a cavern of blue crystal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we have to go beyond it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're on the right road.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think we have to go beyond this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, let's keep moving, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we keep to the edge and try to not disturb the rock as much as possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you move to either edge, you can see the wall comes to a straight meeting with this. Aside from the climbing the walls proper, you have no other way of traversing this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you describe the dimensions of this one more time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. The cavern itself is about 120 to 150 feet wide. You don't see the ceiling right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's that high?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, from our left to our right, 150 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And is it a big circular shape?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can tell, it just opens up and then continues and then darkness. You cannot see beyond it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any rocks around us? Any big rocks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a couple of small spires about 60, 70 feet out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything loose? Anything I can grab near us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Around you? Most everything that's grabbable are part of it, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We don't have the magic carpet. So never mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, do you want to fly?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I say we take a wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Say we just gingerly try and cross against a wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Anything to throw as far as I can out and see if it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look around and find a small pebble, and you chuck it (sound of pebble flying through air and landing) It arcs around, bounces a bit, and comes to rest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! No, I'm not touching that. Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we going to do? Turn around? Grog's that way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, here's my idea. We've got that immovable rod.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, I know where you're going with this, and we'd all have to make a certain--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once again, there's something about this whole area, there's a presence about it. It's ominous, and everywhere about this floor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to touch this. I feel like we should go over it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if these bones come to life?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you send your light source up? Can anybody send light up and see how high the ceiling goes?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (mumbles) Shoot an arrow, if you would, Vex, please? Wherever you wish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Light!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cast out an arrow. As it shoots over, arcs through the air. You get a look of the cavern. You can see it's a large, arched, natural cavern with a number of hanging stalactites at the top. It goes up, arcs past, and then lands probably about a half a mile down the way. Really nice shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it lands with a (impact noise). With what little bit you can see through the arc, this path just continues and continues and continues for that full half mile.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's no way to avoid it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's no way to avoid it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do get a nice view of what looks to be more of these little, central pieces of broken wall. Looks like there was either a small series of structures or buildings that were built once within this cavern that have all completely crumbled to ruin with but a few small bastions of foundation that still remain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiberius, how many times can you cast pillars of... whatever? Pillars.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Grand Columns is the spell, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many times can you cast Grand Columns?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Multiple times, I guess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could we potentially walk on columns across this thing? Potentially.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it goes only so far.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hold on a second. I've got something here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're seeing the remains of buildings scattered throughout, maybe we could go from--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about a wall from out from the side?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The side? And then we walk along that side?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we could do that, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How big is the wall you can make?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What were you going to say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, there's little islands of structure left, we could just--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hop.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stand bridge, stand bridge, stand bridge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can go 120 feet. I can make about 120 feet wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw about a quarter to a half mile. This seems to continue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, that might not be enough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She'd have to do it 20 times.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we may just have to walk gingerly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we can fashion--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we find traps? Check for traps?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we fashion snow boots?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax starts feeling along one side of the wall. Does the ground look firm and more stable on the edges? Or is it all just the same?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you step out a little bit into the area?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hand on the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hand on the wall? I mean, it's a wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, but I mean-- yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you step out with your hand on the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not stepping out yet. I'm looking at the ground. Is it pebbles and rock all the way to the sides?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the way up to the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Lady Keyleth, if you will, could you perhaps make a flat, sturdy stone tablet we could all particularly stand on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Make sure it's under a hundred pounds, if you could. Or actually, two hundred pounds, a little bit more to work with.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I use Stone Shape and I bend down and make a big circle where I am. Carve out a little cylinder with Stone Shape.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, using a very earthbender-y hand motion, you take a portion of the wall right next to you, send it outward and begin to shape it into this large cylinder--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Disc.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disc-like platform, that's (boof) on the ground, right at the base of the platform.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Everybody, hop on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, hop on this rock.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wait a minute, how much does Trinket weigh?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A lot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it 200?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket weighs more than that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Trinket weighs a ton. All of us together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe you could just levitate Trinket behind?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't have that spell anymore. I need to know how much she weighs for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket, I mean, looking at it, you haven't really weighed her yourself, you gather--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's a boy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket weighs approximately-- (all laugh)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trinket's a boy?! With a name like Trinket?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Haven't you seen his wang flopping around under his tail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's probably close to a thousand.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So here's the situation. I can get us all across, but I cannot take Trinket as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not leaving Trinket behind. So everybody get on that and we'll see what happens.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we go across. He can come back and get Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah. How about you guys go and I'll stay with Trinket. You guys go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'm not going to leave her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we make him weightless and then tug him along with the rope? We can't do that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have a question. How many feet across?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like half a mile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Quarter to a half mile from what you can tell, like I said, you only have vision enough to where the arrow arced and it was a very long arc, that just trailed off so you gather anywhere between a quarter to a half mile.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With your heavy armor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sneak right in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, just do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, are we getting on the rock?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far is the closest little island of remaining structure that you referenced?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh it's probably about 60, 70 feet out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't sense any undead with my primal awareness do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The perpetual presence that you sense across the entirety of this bed of bone and glass, if you had to describe it, it has some sort of undead-ish realm. It's not your specialty, I mean it is, like undead creatures are, and the presence is similar to that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I get my Mace of Disruption ready.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and Kima!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh! We're done! We can do this! We polymorph Trinket!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's it, yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We polymorph Trinket!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Very good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Into a tiny tiny?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Make him into a chicken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You instinctively glance around, you look down, and you notice your holy symbol of Sarenrae has a hairline fracture in it. What was once a perfect and impeccable sphere of design-- you've had this your entire life, you look down and see, you don't know how recently, but a portion of the metal symbol itself is cracked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no, this is terrible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike, pray! do something!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I motion over to Pike and I take her medallion slowly off of her and go-- and bring out my Mending Wheel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your Mending Wheel, which was where? It was in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, I held that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Mending Wheel's this big. You haven't been carrying it with you this entire time!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What? I thought it was like this big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Tiberius.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll take my symbol back, put it back on, and say, this is something that I've got to-- this is something I need to deal with. We can't just put it in a Mending Wheel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The gods reward deeds, not words.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe it happened in the fight.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I know why it happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe because you've been killing unarmed people?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think it was when I slit the guy's throat. She got mad. Just a hunch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you know what? We'll do some good deeds when we're done.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. This is something that I need to fix, but thank you for trying.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I forgot we didn't have it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, Trinket, what do you want to be? A lizard? A mouse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear noises)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A kitten? (gasps) A kitten.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A little kitty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want to be a kitten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Trinket glances over at you with a look in the eye of like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I go (floop), and I make him a kitten. What kind of kitten?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's a Persian.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a Persian kitten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's form (shwoop) shifts down into this tiny white puffball with a pushed-in nose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're the cutest, Trinket.

lines.name: ASHLEY
