lines.text: I go and I snuggle, and I nuzzle him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I tuck him into my shirt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sense immediately, Trinket is not necessarily pleased, but will deal with it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, he's so cute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's so cute.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: In Draconia, those are snacks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wouldn't say that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go! Come on! Let's get on this thing! Grog's getting ahead of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go. On our stone airplane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's get on the Wonkavator, everybody.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right hop on. I hop on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you all hop onto this giant stone. It's really cramped, you're all shoulder-to-shoulder pushed onto here, clutched onto your new Persian cat. Kima and Clarota step onto it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast Telekinesis on the stone slab, lift us up, and push us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, how much weight can you push through Telekinesis?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: A thousand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I did all the math. (clears throat) Vax weighs 155, Pike weighs 75. Taliesin weighs 190, Vex weighs 120.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But Scanlan weighs nothing.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sam weighs the same, 75. Keyleth weighs 125.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Kima weighs 105. With all of her armor, she'd be 105.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Clarota can float.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota can float. Does that still fall under a thousand total?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, should. Is that right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus the rock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The rock would be less.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's why I kept a hundred pounds for that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A hundred pounds for the rock.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Want to run those numbers again for the calculator?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rock's 100 pounds? That's not a lot of stone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a very thin piece of stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a very thin piece of stone. All right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We're at nine-something. You can do all the math, but it's nine-something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right, so you all stand on the platform. It (straining noises) rises up, and it's one of those all of you have to gather yourself, but nevertheless it is now floating. How long does it last, concentration wise?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ten minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Quick! Float us!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as Tiberius begins to concentrate, the stone begins to glide out over this expanse of broken bone and obsidian glass.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's how high I take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're cresting about six feet. You have to move it around occasionally to avoid some of the large stalagmites that are jutting out of the bones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see anything? I'm keeping an eye out, see if I see any movement or anything that's maybe sparkles. I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keeping an eye behind us, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (loud yell)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: In front of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In front of you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's it sound like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's male, and it's loud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go! Can we go faster?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We hear this. I push us forward. I mean, we're going in that direction anyways, so I speed us up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth, take the gnomes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, okay. As you speed up and continue--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I jump on Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take the gnomes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grab some feathers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll grab on as well. Why not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Keyleth, you transform maintaining concentration on Polymorph for Trinket, I believe, right? All right. It's not a spell, it's an effect you do. So you (whooshing noise) you transform into a giant eagle, you grab both the gnomes, you guys are lifted up off the platform as the platform continues to push forward.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Cool, so I get a little bit more control over it now. (grunts)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is one duergar who is splattered across the bone floor. You see a troll that is currently in the middle of a fistfight with something that's moving extremely fast. This blur of motion. You can barely make out the physical form before the troll turns and runs in your direction, surprised to see the light coming towards you, and in its expression of extreme confusion and fear, you see something (whoosh) past, and its head just (soft falling sound). Rolls off the top of his shoulders.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not Grog! We're going to toward a monster!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (crashing sound) The troll body hits the ground. As it does you see bits of bone begin to rise up and pull the troll down underneath.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's really good we're not standing on it!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Avoid! (whooshing sound)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Daggers out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guns out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last duergar there, you can see who's looking around, sees the stone platform, and goes, "Let me "on! Let me on!" He goes running over and is trying to jump up towards the stone platform you guys are on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much does he weigh? (giggles)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, he's going to go ahead and try and grab it with an athletics check-- he makes it! (latching noise) He gets onto the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kick him off!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck that guy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I punch him in the face!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, okay. You go ahead and (punch thud noise). You just beat him in the face. He holds tight. You're not a very strong person, unfortunately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab him by the cloak. What is it? What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know! Get it away! Get it away!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In eagle form, I'm going to do a nice high soaring lap.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're on you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know! It's okay! I'm going to use my-- I'm soaring high. It's an easy breeze. We're on the people mover. Okay. And I'm going to use my keen sight to see if I can get a good... (pew)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These blank, white eyes shooting around in different directions spontaneously, with this maddening look. Whatever this is is clearly insane and is currently driven on some sort of hunger bloodlust. The stitch marks you see across its body are very reminiscent of the earlier abominations that you saw, created by K'varn and sent throughout this cavern structure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth's the only one who sees it, though, at this moment?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Do I see it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys haven't yet. At the moment, you're talking to this dwarf or you're shoving him off the platform.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Can I see it as I'm cruising through? I see him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We wanted to throw him as far as we could.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, the twins pull him up and one--

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Two, three!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunting, panting sounds)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (ftsssh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you cast True Strike on yourself?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: On him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On him?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What it does is, it allows me to see--keep going, I'll tell you. Go ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its torso then divides and sprays it with crimson as it (tongue flicking noise) licks it out of the air. (breathy growling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Go faster. Go faster!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm still going! We're still going. I'm not standing and watching.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have we passed it yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone roll initiative.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, we're going to fight? We're going to fight this thing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say we should try and avoid him. Poop monster.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we're floating above it. We've got advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're all stuck on a single piece of rock.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, well, that's the thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're fine. One of us has guns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we saw the duergar get pulled under by skeletal arms?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the bones.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, the bones pulled down, right? So it's not just this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm using this as the figure for the creature.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: By the way, Matthew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: True Strike. I extend my hand and point a finger at a target. My magic grants me a brief insight into the target's defenses. On my next turn, I gain advantage on my first attack roll against the creature, using that spell as a guide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gotcha. So! For the purposes of this, the two gnomes are alongside Keyleth's eagle form.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, we're going to use the little thingy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, are we going to use the levitating thingies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What? Yes, we are. Let me pull them out right now over here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Levitating thingies!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Levitating thingies! Makes us look cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been so long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's the rest of you. Although, Trinket is a kitten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trinket is a cat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trinket only has the power of "adorability."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the stone slab over here that you guys have created. All right, so. Initiative rolls, everyone. Starting at... 25 to 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That puts Vex at the top of the round there. And brings-- there we go. 20 to 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? 15 to ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Team Eight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Boom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, what did you get?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yay, Pike, bringing up the rear!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Team Single Digits!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Team Single Digits!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll get there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually three attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On who?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to be at you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't need this foot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to be one at Kima, one at you and one at Tiberius as you are the three currently within its positioning view. First one is going to be at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that is going to be a 14 to hit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is (laughs) a critical one. It actually whips out and strikes the bottom of the stone you guys are standing on, which rocks it for a second, and you all essentially get worried but it seems to have no effect. That was a really terrible opening round for the creature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here's my question. Is this all happening still over top of the bone pit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hunter's Mark!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right so you mark him

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right on that guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do it. He is Hunter's Marked and I'm putting this on here as a reminder of your mark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's so fashionable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Isn't it though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to lightning arrow him. Oh, I can't do that because I Hunter's Marked him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. that was your bonus action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to Hail of Thorns that guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, thorn hail him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, at level three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Through my Bow of Blazing Bowstring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you pull back your arrow, you pull it up, you can see the thorns (thoosh) actually grow rather rapidly out of the wood itself and as you pull back, the bowstring itself ignites setting the bow, the shaft of the arrow on fire as well as you release, rolling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 to hit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So then I roll my regular damage plus 3d10?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, plus the fire damage which is 1d10.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, whoa. So 14 for the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay and then roll technically 4d10 because it's the fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 4d10, this is crazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 21 plus 14?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 35 points of damage. Nice. So you release (soosh).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh plus Hunter's Mark damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, there you go. That's why you did it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice, 41 points of damage in the first attack from the ranger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (cheers)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so you release the arrow as the creature (woosh) shifts into place, it lashes out with all its tentacles and as it pulls back, looks like it's ready to pounce you release the arrow right towards its torso, it hits, and it looks down instinctually and it bursts into a spray of thorns all over its face and its torso and you can see it (monster screech) reels back from the pain, you can see the flames licking up over the front of its body. You can see there's a semblance of clothing on it. Whatever this thing once was, it's still wearing the clothing it had and a portion of it has burned off part of the torso. Whoever this poor soul once was, there is no shred of humanity left in it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Before that ends I go, hop off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hop off? No way. I'm not stepping on this bone shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's undead things in there

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's your turn, and you're holding a kitten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh he's tucked into my armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius, what are you doing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tibber-hoods.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you got?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, everyone hold on tight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're giving us opposite notes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you got?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How wide was the stone tablet? Ten feet for all of us to fit on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 15 feet round.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Perfect, I move us right above the butthole and, everybody hold on. And I fucking slam all of us right on him. (boosh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So the platform comes cascading down at a fair speed immediately breaking over this creature, as it is a pretty thin wall to have only been about 100 pounds. It completely shatters over the top of it. Everyone who was on that platform, go ahead and make a dexterity check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Get it, guys. Come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get two because it's favored terrain, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, okay good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Pike's not there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm not happening for a while.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Me too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. All right. So all the rest of you manage to leap off and tumble the best you can to catch yourself-- except for Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wait, do I make a dexterity check? I mean I'm not-- okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. You're still on the platform. It just shattered around you. So you however fall prone on the ground from the impact and land on the ground. That's also going to end your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did it do any damage?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Can I not do any bonus actions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately not, due to the failed dexterity save. It practically knocked the wind out of you due to the impact.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was the unfortunate part of missing that dexterity check.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, it does deal from the crushing damage to the entity that'll be I'll say 3d10 points of damage. I'll see if it makes its save to reduce to half. Which it does. Rolled a 21. What's your DC in your spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll 3d10 and it's half that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (counting noises) What is that, 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it takes a total of nine points of damage. Crushing damage from the blow of the stone on top of it. Nice. As it (crssh) shrugs off bits of chunks of stone that are around its body, you can see a little bit of blood is being pulled to the seams of its body. It's taken some hits. It's still doing all right but it's definitely-- you can see it's not impervious by any means. That brings us to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, well, I use my bonus action to click my Boots of Haste together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your Boot of Haste.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Boot of Haste? But aren't magic items resistant to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah I was messing around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 32 for the first attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You unfortunately do not get sneak attack on this. It knows where you are. You do not get the round before it-- nobody else is adjacent to it because everyone else had to jump off the platform.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So no one's right next to it? I'm the closest one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently no. You are the closest one to it because everyone had to jump off as it fell, and the fact that as soon as you rush towards it, its head (cracking noise) clicked over its back and looked straight at you, almost the neck bending in the process.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You block me every chance you get with this one. So that was the first attack...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this creature is really quick and very aware of its surroundings.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here comes the poison dagger, which is 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. That does hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is ten. Because of the Boots of Haste, I get a third attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that misses entirely. In fact, I think I threw my dagger into the bones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll a one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A one, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the first strike hits. The second one, you feel the poison energy pulse through the blade. What's the DC on that again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima, who just managed to land, grabs her sword and reaches over. You can see the divine energy instilled within her blade. She is going to make two attacks against the creature. lines.name: ORION

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Okay. That's seven.

lines.text: Okay, so there's no damage on this. Go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.text: (all cheer)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice! So you grab it, and you pull it. You have it currently held. Its physical body is pulled to the ground, and you can see its arms are trying to pull it up off the ground, and (slurpy noises) flipping around. Complete chaos in the air. You imagine you'll probably have a hard time holding it down, but for now it's currently blinded and grappled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With haste, I have a third attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to drag across its throat. That is a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that's seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, seven damage? All right. Cool. You bring the blade across, and you can see the blood begin to pour out from it, and as it does, you can see the throat opens up, and where you cut on the throat you can see what looks like white gleaming teeth on the inside of its throat. The entire interior of its trachea is coated with teeth.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (noises of disgust)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It has a maw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes the sword, swings it, and is going to come on down, spending a level-three spell as a Divine Smite against it. That hits with a 22. This advantage is kicking its ass. Second attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice Blind, Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oof. Yeah. Both hit. All right. 36 points of damage, and a divine strike. And 12 points on the second blow. As she comes down and slams it with the big sword twice, the first one arcing down with divine energy, streaking across the barely-lit cavernous area. It hits the ground, and it splatters blood across. You can see one of its tentacles is barely hanging on by just a section of muscle and sinew. However, she looks down real fast, and you can see now these skeletal hands are reaching up and grabbing her legs and starting to pull her down. She's going to attempt to try--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Kima?

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: Kima.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I wonder if that's going to happen to all of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Clarota's turn. Clarota is going to move--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who all is on the dance floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ugh, can't do this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of us except for Percy, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota's going to stand here and pull back and begin to coalesce this bluish crackling energy in Clarota's hand. The tentacles of Clarota's face begin to swirl and pull back into this horrible grimace as it releases this bolt of lighting energy that arcs past, just overhead of where Kima is, since Kima's been pulled down below. Lightning Bolt. Two ones in a row, are you fucking kidding me? I'm rolling terribly tonight, guys, by the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's mostly in our favor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still makes it, so (laughs) with a Lightning Bolt that does a grand total of seven points of damage--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's better than one, Clarota! It's better than one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota looks away dejectedly. "It was the best I could do." All right. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Seeing Lady Kima slowly getting taken under, I make eye contact with her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, continue.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. And I make a Grasping Vine from that stalactite over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. And I'm going to take it and wrap it around Lady Kima and try to yank her out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. So as the vine pulls out of the side of this rock (whoosh), it reaches out and wraps itself around her body and begins to pull.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Around her waist. Not her neck, again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good distinction. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just wanting that out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's a good thing. So, Grasping Vine... yeah, okay. So it pulls 20 feet; she gets pulled 20 feet. I'll go ahead and say, make a wisdom check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying not to hurt her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, I understand. This is more your strength of will versus the strength of whatever--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just adding my wisdom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20. Total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. So, as the vine wraps around her and begins to pull, she reaches over and grabs the vine for extra strength, and (fwoomp) it pulls her out of the wall. She goes flying over and lands at the side of the stone with a vine that's still loosely wrapped around her, but it's definitely pulled her free of the floor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I leave it to where it's holding her up, to where it's not touching?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure! Yeah. She's currently held aloft by this vine that strapped her. She's looking confused. Thankful, but also wants to be let go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I take a bonus action to shout at her? Be like, "Calm down Kima! Jeez!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Is that the end of your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! As you finish casting the spell and shouting at her, you look down and notice the ground. (swish, shoosh) Begins pulling you down

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm still on the stalactites. I haven't moved off the stalactite! I'm straddling it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A little straddle action!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm riding that stalactite

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Riding it side-saddle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's really hard to be on top of that and cast spells and talk about this. (chuckling) It's a giant piece. I'm going to say, go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Ooh! 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! You manage to precariously stay on the top of this stalactite, holding on to it, casting spells and shouting out. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jeez, Kima! Stop! This is hard already!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to crawl and find myself a seat on top of that stalactite. That's my first thing I'm going to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, well, at the start of your turn, make a dexterity check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You manage to pull out. Now make an athletics check to try and make your way up to the top of this rock.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Athletics or acrobatics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be athletics, just to pull yourself up on the side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Rock climbing check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Okay! You can decide whether or not you want to attempt to ascend this or make any attacks this turn, because right now it's going to take your full round to get to the top of this. It's a very thin, jagged, almost vertical wall you're trying to climb up and hold onto.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How far away am I from the stones? From the platform?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the platform here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From something I can stand on that's not sand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're probably about 35 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I could make it in a run?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could make it in a run, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I mean, in a standard movement action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You'd almost make it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What's your movement?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My movement is 30. Just almost make it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Right now, this wall's blocking you from even seeing the creature. As far as you know, you see a giant wall and you hear fighting on the other side of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll make it to the top of the stalactite, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there anywhere I can stay on the dance floor and get a line of sight with the creature?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say you'll be able to get right up next to Tiberius, right here, and be able to get line of sight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And can I throw lightning and not hit Tiberius?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (nervous laugh) Okay, then. Then I don't do that. Instead, I will-- I've got nothing to do! Let's say I will try to-- is she-- it's a he.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a he.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a he! God!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have no ranged attacks. Except I can Viciously Mock it, so that's what I'll do. I'll say, you know what? Your tentacles make you look kind of fat, and the elf thing is played out. It's sort of 1990s. Orlando Bloom. And the whole bone thing is just really tacky!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I look at Scanlan curiously. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And for a moment, it seems to sag all its tentacles. Go ahead and roll damage for your Vicious Mockery.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was just seeing if there's another effect of Vicious Mockery.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He's sad for a while. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there anything else it does?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's dead!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he just dies!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Negative two to self-esteem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vicious Mockery-- has disadvantage on-- okay! So it has disadvantage on disadvantage on its next attack. Got it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does that mean it has triple?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nah. If it did, that would be awesome. Pike, you're up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You are strangely inspired by that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I giggle-snort.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That brings us to Pike. You're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so where are we at? I'm so sorry. I can't see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's way off to the side and a bunch of people are in a row on top of a wall that Keyleth created.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to use my Sprinter's Boots and get over. Everybody's healed; everybody hasn't really taken too many hit points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've guys rolled really well and it has rolled terribly.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I'm going to go around here. Oh, I don't know, can I have--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a very thin wall. Make an acrobatics check to try and move and tumble through the people. With disadvantage because you're in heavy plate armor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you've got inspiration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can add that to your roll. So add inspiration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll twice. You're at disadvantage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What, plus eight?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can roll a d8.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's advantage, so pick the higher.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, disadvantage, because she's in heavy armor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh oh oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? You just manage to barely squeeze through people without falling off of the top of the wall, finding yourself right there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. So then, since I'm there, I'm going to cast Guiding Bolt again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then I'm going to cast it at 4th level again. And then, which is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll to attack twice. You have to roll to hit it first. Roll twice, because it is blinded and has disadvantage. You have advantage on it, I mean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus your spell thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 plus your spell.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, which would be 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are at 4th level, that is 7d6 damage.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Nice! Holy crap.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, perhaps you should spare it for your god, or offer it in sacrifice to your god?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a lot of math.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what? Women are good at math.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: They are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably better than men.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I would say probably.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then do I add anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's just the 7d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 damage, nice!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good adding.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, thanks!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This divine energy materializes and shines down in a god ray onto your hand as you gather it with your fingers, it seems to formulate this actual thick rock feeling sensation. You swing it underhand softball pitch with absolute furious anger that slams into the side of the creature, bursting with the divine energy, doing a very sincerely impressive amount of damage for a small Guiding Bolt. It's currently still trying to get back up after Vax has been holding it to the ground. You can see it blast its side. You are almost pulled over on top of it by the sheer force of the impact.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry, Vax!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to the top of it now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's still alive?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's still alive?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's got that healing factor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we undo its healing factor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After all the impact, all the sounds it's hearing, it moves over to this vicinity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ain't he grappled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you're holding it here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm holding it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to attempt to break from your grapple.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good luck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I get advantage on this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For this check, you do, I believe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, good. 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27? 29. It slips out of your grasp, moves over to this vicinity here. And you can see now, the tendrils open up, even though its eyes can't see. You can see what looks like a bunch of gills across its body, slits in its torso and it almost looks like all of them open up into these tiny little mouths. You can also see teeth rippling through them and expels this cloud of green gas that (fssh) around everyone within ten feet of it. Everyone on the wall, right here. Clarota-- you are just out of range of it-- and Kima are affected. So that would be Pike, Vex, Trinket, technically. Clarota. So I need you guys to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (garbled) Make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike? Whenever she comes back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who has to do this? Pike, Clarota?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, Clarota, Trinket, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I roll for Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait until she gets back. What did you roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19. Oh, 19 and then for Trinket-- oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota does not make it. Kima does not make it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can roll for Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got this, guys. We're connected in a special gnome way that you have no idea how pure this bond is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here comes the one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 16, plus whatever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, plus her-- wait, I'm looking up her constitution. Plus one. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Trinket rolled a...?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) And that's the power of love!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I rolled a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, as this cloud of greenish gas bursts out from all these strange slits in its body, you feel this acidic fume fill your lungs and touch your skin. You manage to duck out of the way and resist a lot of the damage, as does Pike, pulling up her cloak in front of the way. You guys take 14 points of acid damage. However, Clarota and Kima and Trinket all take 28 points of acid damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) 28 points?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Trinket still a cat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's kitten form is taken away as the Polymorph wears off--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit. Boom!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (boosh) This bear bursts out from your chest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no, your shirt is ripped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of a sudden, my bosom comes flying out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket has taken 23 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, you just took 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of acid poison damage, as this entity vented its torso into this giant fume of acidic gas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It would have been much more if Scanlan hadn't been around, that's all I'm saying.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, wow. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which Trinket bursts out of Vex's torso, landing into the bones below. (growls)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, in the bones?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because on the wall (fwoosh) out in front of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Five. Five hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five hit points. That's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Five hit points, everyone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anything-- what's nearby? Is anything within five feet of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, actually, I should see if it-- it does resist. It is no longer blinded.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, snap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the darkness fades from its eyes and the whiteness bursts from its face. It's intent now, as each eye individually darts around and takes reference of all the points of possible attack that are now before it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, its blindness wore off? Oh, poop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is anything within five feet of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's going to be affected. Oh! I command Trinket to move, then. Can he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Trinket can, yeah, if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can he try to climb up and get away from it? Oh, no. He'll take a hit, won't he.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If it hits. It could miss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, but he's so low on health.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where's he at?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's right next to it! Get up, Trinket, get up on the wall. And I'm going to cast Hail of Thorns on the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the radius on Hail of Thorns?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five feet. Okay. Trinket is going to attempt to get up the wall. Make an athletics check for Trinket, (laughs) who's going to try and climb a ten-foot solid stone wall, which is--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bears can climb trees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trees, yes. Solid, smooth stone walls? Little more of... but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it, is it an acrobatics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be athletics for Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Athletics. I don't know what to add, but it's 19 plus whatever. Strength?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 plus strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Trinket scrambles up the side of the wall. As it does, one of the white eyes is looking around like an iguana (tchh) focuses on Trinket, (whoosh) goes to whip toward Trinket. That is going to be a 24 versus his armor class.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it hits!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket takes 17 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus an additional five points of acid damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's unconscious!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Trinket climbs up the wall, (shh, groan) and then streaks and falls back down onto the bone, unconscious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bear down!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll heal him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no! He's lying in the skeletons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're now there up top. What are you going to do? You watched Trinket fall and hit the ground.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Kill him!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I get to-- can I move if I attack, or is that it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gave Trinket your move on this turn, so you can still attack from where you are.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Attack him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will somebody save Trinket?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll save Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I still attack him. But wait, will I do damage to Trinket, then, still on the ground, unconscious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I was going to do Hail of Thorns, but I shouldn't because he's within five feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within five feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could do a regular arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I do a regular flaming arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've used your flaming arrow twice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I only used it once.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you used it at the top of the round, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shitballs. Okay, then I'm-- I have regular arrows. I'm going to use Bloodseeking Bow, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. I'm freaking out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make your bloodseeking strike, now, with the fury and anger and frustration--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Roll for damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 11, plus Hunter's Mark. 15. And then the Bloodseeking Bow does ten bleeding damage each round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. Okay, when we get back to its turn, it'll have ten bleeding damage on it. You have your second attack, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 12. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Death saving throw?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three successes or three fails. That's first fail.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, what? No. I can add a plus ten, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To a death saving throw?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay. I assess the situation, and I don't like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The end.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No. I cast Watery Sphere on him, and try to capture the guy in my sphere. That is-- oh, plus this! (gasps) Oh my god, I always forget it's that number. It's 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27? All right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: 18 plus nine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm just trying to get familiar with this one real fast, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So he uses his spell attack bonus, I'm assuming?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Watery Sphere, you said?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah. I was looking that up, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Saving throw. That is a 21. What's the DC for your spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So yeah. The sphere appears. The creature is ejected from the side right there. So the sphere is still there, but the creature is un-grabbed by it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Does it do damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as I know, it just grabs.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ugh. All right. That's my bad, I shouldn't have--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It restrains and grabs things inside when it has them. It works more as control than as a damaging spell, but the sphere is still there.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, fine. I can still move it, yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you pick Trinket up and bring him up on the wall?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: She's got this. I'll move it over just to make him all soak-y in it anyway. It's not going to-- I can't move him. It doesn't control him, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not if he makes the save. If he fails the save, then yes, you have them trapped in the sphere, but currently basically (sploosh) pushed his way out of it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, fine. I don't do that. I spend-- I don't do anything, actually. That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so Clarota's right by it, so I'm going to roll along the back of the thing and sneak attack right into its back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right there. Yeah, roll around next to him, one dagger in. That is a 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29. Yeah, that hits. Damn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (counts quietly) Okay, that is 33, plus sneak attack damage, so three, seven. Shit. 18, 20. That's 40 plus four. 44.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rogues, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 51. I want to carve his shoulder blade out and away like a piece of turkey--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a critical.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Critical's the double. Oh, sorry, scale that back to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20. It was 20 plus two, 22. 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 points of damage. Still nice. So as you reach back and you angrily take the dagger and drag it down, you actually find one of those seams of its arm, and you drag it across the front as the arm actually (floop) falls off on the ground and it squirms on its own.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's taking this thing so long?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've managed to pull one of its tentacles off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits. That's 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that is seven points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Last dagger out. That's 26, for eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How is this thing not dead?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima is going to rush around here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't be stupid, Kima!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is it with you and Kima?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's been stupid, all right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you talking about? She's a paladin!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's fighting with us! Don't dispirit her while we're fighting!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is really awkward for the rest of us, just so you know. We really like her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima's going to attack twice with her greatsword.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't like her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't like her either, but I'm not openly hostile to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Instead, is going to--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What does Clarota want to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dance.

lines.name: ASHLEY, LAURA
lines.text: Dance!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota currently has his tentacles wrapped up onto it and is trying to pull it down with a combination of psionic energy and its tentacle grab. Keyleth, you're up!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seeing that Clarota just grappled him, I'm like, "All right, cool. That's good." And I'm going to use a Grasping Vine from the other stalactite and grab Trinket and see if I can--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Around his waist!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Around his waist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You use another 4th-level Grasping Vine?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So the Grasping Vine-- from this one here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope, that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The wall is here, so it's going to have to curl around the side, wrap around the body. As it begins to pull, you can see the bones have already begun to reach up and begun to start pulling Trinket's body down. Go ahead and make the check for that again which is...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Will.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, will?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For this one I think it was to try and-- wait a sec, I'm just making sure. I think it was wisdom for the-- Let me check it real fast, just to make sure. This is starting to get down to the heavy. "Creature must make dexterity saving throw to resist pull." Yeah, so go ahead and make a willpower check. Wisdom check, sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20 again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The vine wraps around Trinket and begins to pull. The bones hold tight and the body is not moving from its position.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a standoff between the vine holding the unconscious body of Trinket, who you can see is still moving and shifting in unconsciousness. The bones are beginning to rise up almost like this slow tide to begin to wrap over the body. All right, that brings us to Percy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, so we don't know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's at a standoff right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a standoff. It's tug-of-war.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Not sinking, but not being pulled out, either. It's this stalemate right now between the two. The vine is taut and holding Trinket level.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to spend my movement to get nice and firm, sit myself down, pull out the big gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Bad News. You see it over this wall now. The top of this stalagmite-- it's about 50 feet to the top. You get to the top, you pull the Bad News out. You have a pretty clear shot down towards the entity.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (all cheer)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage for this one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to be so much fun. (counts out loud) 42 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (all cheer)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take a bead and I want to wait until the eye is looking right at me, and I want to take it right through the eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You release, pull back on the trigger... (gunshot) The impact blows you off the top of the stalagmite. You fall in the air, but in that split second, you keep your vision on as you're floating back and this whole-- this moment as time slows, not wanting to lose this moment, you see the bullet (ssst) into the head. One of the eyes now goes dark from the crimson impact. The jaw opens slack (groaning), with all the teeth exposing as the back of the head (explosion).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (maniacal laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Explodes. All across Vax. Who was standing behind it, just (vrushh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love it! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket is still currently being held aloft.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I see what's going on. I cast Telekinesis (fssh) and start pulling it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an arcana check. You have advantage on this because the Grasping Vine is also helping.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh my god. Arcana? 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? You (strains) you're pulling, you're pulling, you're pulling, but unfortunately whatever cursed force holds this land is keeping the body--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I run up and take the Mace of Disruption, which also has the holy oil on it, which fights against undead! So I take it and I go (ffff) right underneath.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look down and see this happening with the effort of both of them unable to do so. You leap off the top of the wall, swinging the Mace of Disruption down in a giant arc. You slam it into the bones on the side of Trinket's body. As you do, you see the actual stone and bones around it cave in and shatter into dust at the sheer force of your Mace of Disruption, leaving this big old cavernous space where there once was ground. As you bring it up again, you begin swinging it around the outside of Trinket, releasing all of the bone in the vicinity. As you do, you also notice that the bone at your feet that's beginning to grab onto your legs as you landed begins to give away and slowly back away from you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grab onto the vine!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's scared of her.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's scared of me. Yeah, that's right!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get Trinket out, and I'll pull Pike up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I pull the bear out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between the two of you guys, you manage to, now that it's been released from the bone, as Tiberius (strains) lifts up and the vine grasping, you lift Trinket up onto the wall, and Tiberius you (thud) release Trinket on the top of the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm healing! Giving a healing potion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I take my Grasping Vine and I want to reach out and grab the elven man real quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach out the Grasping Vine and you lift up the remnants of the elven man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I want to throw his remnants back onto our dance floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you've all gathered around, you administer a potion. Trinket heals-- which potion are you using?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The minimum, because someone else can heal him, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. That'll be 2d4 + 2.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven. He's only got seven little health points!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Trinket comes to consciousness. (bear moan)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as it opens up and the first thing Trinket sees is your face, Trinket begins to lick the side of your face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! (sobs) Buddy! I'm crying and I'm petting him and I say, "It's okay."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima, Clarota, and Vax. You guys are still on the ground. You can feel the stones and bones beginning to pull up against your feet. Clarota immediately begins to lift off the ground using his Levitation ability, and pulls free of the bones, lifts there for a second. Yes?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I keep propellering my Mace of Disruption as I walk? On the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. As you're walking along, you're just (kssh) hitting bits of bone. As you are, they just disintegrate and turn into dust. It's leaving a track. A little bit of a groove in the ground as you do so.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Follow me! Follow the track!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See if I see anything with this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With this corpse. Does anyone want to help me? Who's got better investigation?

lines.name: TALIESIN, SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got it, but I'm busy with Trinket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, never mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got it. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24? All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: as you inspect the shoulders where the tentacles are, you start seeing these strange little fleshy nubs, and as you pull away at where the wounds were taken from pulling off, you can see there are arms inside the torso that were pushed inside to attach this entity.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can we--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can you what?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Go ahead. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see a couple of fingers poking out of each side.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we take the body?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we see any ligatures? Is there sewing? Or has it been stitched together?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tentacles were stitched to it, and you can't see any actual stitches, like it's this weird thing where it's actually bonded to it, but it looks like some sort of strange--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll do an arcana check on that, and I already got 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There is a magical essence from somewhere in the torso, but you can't quite ascertain--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From somewhere in the torso?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we recognize this elf at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You don't recognize any of its face because it's gone. Bad News disintegrated its head. Unless you want to piece all the pieces that are currently on Vax together and try to reform the face, but from what you can tell it wasn't anything you could recognize necessarily.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take out my dagger and dig into his torso.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you (squishy flesh sounds) begin to pull out bits, the rest of you guys manage to make your way up to the top of this stone wall now. You're all for the most part safe, for the time being.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find the fingers are attached to a hand, which are attached to a wrist. You pull a little bit, and with this horrible sickening (fssht) sound you manage to pull an arm out from inside the torso, covered in its own blood and fluids.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Prestidigitation! Clean that up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You clean it off. The magical essence you were seeing earlier actually is coming from a set of metallic bracers that are on the wrists.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take them! I take them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't put them on, though. Don't put them on.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll inspect them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're cursed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an arcana check.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Let's see. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? It takes you a while, but you manage to get an idea of what the essence of the magic is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it's for you, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really? Let me see it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Translated, it's Bracers of Archery. You should check it out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I cast Cure Wounds on Trinket? And I cast him to 20. Second level. I rolled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled a 20 total?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. 20 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So Trinket heals 20 more hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yay! Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So keep tabs on that because that will carry over into the next session. All right. So you guys are now standing aloft, on the wall. You can barely see past, about another 120, 150 feet ahead of you, the sea of bone chips and glass seems to eventually fade into more stone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's get out of here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, will you lead the way, Pike, with your crazy mace path?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Air guitar us out of here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I keep on? (guitar noises)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Actually, wait a minute. Hold on a sec. My water sphere is still there, isn't it? I'm going to take it and push it along our way as well, in front of her who's swinging it as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Push it up to 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're pushing this behind her?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: In front of her. Just a nice little (pssht) like 30 feet from where we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So the sphere crests ahead as you guys push forward. Pike, you're taking your mace of disruption with your shield up and you're slamming it before you. As it does there's just plumes of dust that are being cast in the air behind you guys. You cough a little bit as it's lifting the small spray of dust. You begin to make your way across this open field of bone and glass to the other side, finding for the first time in a little bit of time solid stone ground. You all take a moment and gather your breath, and as you're taking a moment, you look over and you can see in the darkness ahead of you what looks to be a faint source of light around another large pillar or cluster of stone in the distance.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it a color?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see any tracks around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's reddish-orange and appears to have a flicker to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see tracks? Can I sense goliath tracks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a survival check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far away is it from us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's probably about 70, 80 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25? You see more duergar feet patterns, and you see those same singular tracks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you said it's flickering, the light?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably a campfire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go kick some ass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Want to go see?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll go take a look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll stealth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take a short rest there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we need it? Is anyone hurt?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a short one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everyone rest while I go peek, because I'm fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't need rest for spells, we just need rest for health, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a short rest, yeah, so I can recharge my animal changes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If we take a short rest, do we get any spells back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you roll disadvantage on that one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disadvantage?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your foot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because of your foot!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But the cloak then cancels it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, yes, so you're fine. It's a natural roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, okay. So you make your way through the darkness, around the side of the stone platform and as you crest your vision, you can see the flickering is indeed a small campfire. Not used for light, but apparently used for cooking as the scent also hits you. There is some sort of meat currently being cooked on this flame.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it smell good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your mind for second thinks, "Oh god, are they eating him?" but you see he appears to be intact, though with a quick glance as you peer around the other side of the stone column, you can see his body is riddled with scratches and small wounds and incisions, and you can see where streaks of dried blood are across his entire body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're going to try to make him into one of the stitch monsters!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, they are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also do see, across the way there are three tents set up around this area. One of the tents opens up and you see a duergar female step out: silver circlet across her forehead, long robes. Queen Ulara walks up and starts talking to the other duergar, pointing to your goliath friend, to Grog, on the front of this. Motions to the other two and steps back into the tent, closing it behind her as the two other duergar grin. One reaches into his pouch and begins to pull out small, looks like metal hooked utensils, possibly to go in for another round of whatever they'd been doing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to kill that bitch!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Into my earring, (whispers) Come, now.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ooh! Vax just said we should go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) We should go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (all groan)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. That was exciting, and I feel empowering to a lot of the female-- (all laugh)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Female viewers, absolutely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike did a lot of important things.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Absolutely, I would agree.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Hola, everybody!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Hola!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: (sighs) That was intense again! You guys are giving me anxiety attacks, you guys and Felicia being in the chat room the whole time. So I wanted to shout out some thank yous. Oh, and you guys still have time if you scroll down on the main page to 826LA donate button, click on that and donate for these guys, for the wonderful work that they're doing, and we're getting ready to read out all of your donation messages on the stream.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, thank you guys so much for donating to 826LA. They're an amazing charity and your support is very much appreciated.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: First off, we wanted to thank a couple people that provided the food for tonight.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: ManaGeek Moosiyuk, Moosiuk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moosiuk! ManaGeek! Thank you guys!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: And Timothy Hudson and Amir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Amir!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was so good!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Donation messages...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a note, guys, good choice tonight on the abyssal abomination.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, they did that?!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: That was the chat room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did that?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They did, yeah...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Chat room!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was mean!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You almost killed a bear.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Okay, guys. We've got a lot of these. You ready? We've got AxisOfAnarchy. "Less than three "Matt, Taliesin, Ashley, Marisha, Laura, Liam, Orion, and Sam. #FindGrog."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We did!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We found him.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Vorack1024. "Glad to donate every week for such a good cause. Critical Role is an inspiration "to my entire D&D party, and watching helps my DMing greatly. Thank you so much."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, man. Yay, thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Meg_TheDreamer. "#CriticalRole, thank you so much for everything with"-- oh gosh, these are so hard to read-- "with amazing stories, adventures, and great senses of humor that brings happiness "and makes me laugh and warms my heart. Thank you so much for the love, my art, oh, twitter "@TheAnimeDreamer and my birthday wishes to Meghan L."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, Meghan! Yay!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks for all your art, Meghan. Your art's great.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: ZandorInvictus. "Made the easy decision to skip the midnight showing of Avengers to catch the "show. #LessThanThree."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw!

If you're a sub, it'll be up immediately. If you're not a sub, we'll do a rebroadcast, and if you wait (whistles) four hours from now, it'll probably be back in the rotation, and by tomorrow afternoon it'll be up on the website.

lines.text: Thank you guys so much. Just because we didn't get a chance to read, please don't stop donating. All you've got to do is scroll down to donate to 856LA or they'll link it in the chat room. Tune in tomorrow. We have Felicia Day stopping by to play Lady Games, so everyone will be dressed up in suits.

lines.text: We're playing Ladies and Gentlemen, and there might be some gender reversal going on in that, and we're also going to be doing a new card game that was just Kickstarted with Indicade, and we have musical guest Echo Sparks coming by, as well as So You Don't Have To with Hector and Becca. We will be doing some things to them that are not very polite, and making them play pony games because we have a lot of pony Steam keys to give away.
